TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed ADODC/EOFActionEnum extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 property.

span.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，`EOFAction`属性用于确定何种操作`ADODC`采用时`EOF`属性为 true。In Visual Basic 6.0, the `EOFAction` property was used to determine what action the `ADODC` takes when the `EOF` property is true. 这些常数启用已从 Visual Basic 6.0 中继续运行而不进行其他修改升级的代码。These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象重复可在其他命名空间中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: Moving past the last record triggers the 's event to occur on the current record, followed by an automatic , followed by a event on the new record.

span.span: Moving past the last record triggers the 's event to occur on the current record, followed by an automatic , followed by a event on the new record.

summary.span: Keeps the last record as the current record.

span.span: Keeps the last record as the current record.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC/EOFActionEnum adStayEOF = int32(1)

summary.span: Moving past the end of a triggers the 's event on the last record, followed by a event on the invalid () record.
